definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly

sentences.chinese: 我們喫着綠色的吉露果子凍。

sentences.english: Fruit jelly with milk taste is loved By Both young and old.
sentences.chinese: 奶汁飄香的果子凍，老少都喜歡。

sentences.english: An aspic is sort of a beef-flavored Jell-O mold.
sentences.chinese: 肉凍就是牛肉味的吉露果子凍。

sentences.english: Jelly solidifies as it gets cold .
She mixed peanut butter and fruit jelly in a sandwich.
sentences.chinese: 她把花生醬和果子凍混合在一塊三明治裏。

sentences.english: I love Jell-O too. Oh, and peanut butter, right?
sentences.chinese: 我也愛果子凍哦，還有花生黃油，對吧？

sentences.english: Do you think this jelly 's firm enough to eat yet?
sentences.chinese: 你以爲這果子凍已經硬得可以吃了嗎？
